metadata.Title: CVE-2023-38594 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: The issue was addressed with improved checks. This issue is fixed in iOS15.7.8 and iPadOS 15.7.8, iOS 16.6 and iPadOS 16.6, tvOS 16.6, macOSVentura 13.5, Safari 16.6, watchOS 9.6. Processing web content may lead toarbitrary code execution.

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
wpewebkit package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
